synopsis.text: Mai and Keisuke Niijima, a father-daughter duo, have been living in a world of melancholy ever since the passing of their beloved wife and mother, Takae, a decade ago. Their lives take an unexpected turn when an elementary school student shows up at their doorstep, claiming to be the reincarnation of Takae. Despite the initial shock and disbelief, Keisuke and Mai begin to see glimpses of Takae in the young girl's behavior and mannerisms. As they navigate through this peculiar situation, the family must find a way to heal old wounds, reconnect with each other, and rediscover the joy of living. Follow this unique and heartwarming journey as they attempt to mend their fractured lives and create new memories together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
